sentence.Network_en: Your efforts shall have been nugatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的努力也就没有价值了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以n开头的英语英文单词 ... nudity 裸露 nugatory 无价值的，琐碎的 nugget 金块,贵金属块,硬块.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... nomadic 游牧的；流浪的 nugatory 无价值的 numismatist 钱币学家.

list.abs: a nugatory idea , argument , proposal , etc., 无意义的想法 , 争论 , 建议等.
a mendicant Buddhist monk 化缘和尚a nugatory agreement 无效的协定a palatable solution to the problem. 这个问题的合乎人意的解决方.
novation 约务更替；债务更替文件nugatory expenditure 不必要开支numb

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin nugatorius, from nugari 'to trifle', from nugae 'jests'

auth_sentence.content: She could feel her contentment ebbing away, felt it...to be nugatory, laughable.
auth_sentence.res_content: She could feel her contentment ebbing away, felt it...to be nugatory, laughable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She could feel her contentment ebbing away, felt it...to be nugatory, laughable.

auth_sentence.content: He's going to make Justin Bieber look like some nugatory hipster concern that only ever gets discussed on Pitchfork.
